content: DX 5-F10 Powder-actuated tool Digitally enabled, fully automatic and high-productivity powder actuated nailer for fastening W10 threaded studs ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Smart tool that tells you when cleaning or maintenance is required Built-in connectivity with the Hilti Connect app – putting key tool data, how-to videos and technical support at the operators fingertips High productivity – fully automatic piston return and cartridge transport Ideal for driving DS heavy-duty fasteners and 3/8 threaded studs Features power regulation for optimum fastener driving control Applications Installing overhead sprinkler pipe suspensions using W10 threaded studs Fastening installation channels to steel and tough concrete using DS nails or W10 threaded studs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 18.6 x 2.8 x 7.1 in Weight: 7.5 lb. Fastener Intake: Single Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 18.6 x 2.8 x 7.1 in | Weight | 7.5 lb | Fastener Intake | Single | Fastener length range | 0.75 - 2.83 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M10 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | Yes | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 325 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-6-5-P10 ### ITEMS
